main event: One white, oval-shaped object observed for about 4-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed at night and appeared about 1 star in apparent size,The sighting lasted for approximately 4-5 minutes,The observer could estimate the speed of the object at 5-7 miles per hour, The observer estimated the distance of the object to be 50-75 feet away, The observer described the object as a little white ball of light glowing in a clear night sky.
witness description: The main observer described the sighting, and it was corroborated by three additional witnesses.
